org.wikidata.wdtk.dumpfiles.DumpContentType

Packages that use DumpContentType
Package
Description
org.wikidata.wdtk.dumpfiles
Components for downloading and processing Wikibase dump files.
org.wikidata.wdtk.dumpfiles.wmf
Code that is specific to the dump file exports of the Wikimedia Foundation (WMF).

    static String
    WmfDumpFile.getDumpFileWebDirectory(DumpContentType dumpContentType, String projectName)
    Returns the absolute directory on the Web site where dumpfiles of the given type can be found.
    static boolean
    WmfDumpFile.isRevisionDumpFile(DumpContentType dumpContentType)
    Returns true if the given dump file type contains page revisions and false if it does not.
